item.title: WATCH: What we know about the Reiner family history
item.description: ABC News’ Chris Connelly reports on the tragedy involving the Hollywood family.

item.title: Reiner murders latest: Son's case to be presented to DA
item.description: Nick Reiner is accused of killing his parents, and the case against him will be presented to the Los Angeles County District Attorney’s Office.

item.title: As Brown shooting manhunt continues, FBI offers reward for info leading to conviction
item.description: The FBI was asking for the public's help finding a man "with a stocky build" in connection with Saturday's fatal mass shooting in Providence, Rhode Is...

item.title: Military conducts 3 more boat strikes in the Pacific, killing 8: SOUTHCOM
item.description: The U.S. military said on Monday it struck three more alleged drug boats in the Eastern Pacific, leaving eight dead.

item.title: WATCH: Tiny puppy saved by adoptive doggie mom finds forever home
item.description: ABC News' Danny New has the inspiring story of Gus, a dog born half the size of all his siblings and proof that the best things come to those who wait...
